name: Meteor Shower (itch) (David Sohn)
description:
Shoot the giant spinny thing with your meteorite gun.  If the meteorite hits an arrow, it goes faster.  Launch the spinny thing as far as you can.

Best viewed in full screen.

Music by: cynicmusic.com

Sound effects by Kenny: www.kenney.nl
Sound effects also by yawfle, pbimal, mamamucodes on freesound.org

Used with CC0 license.
